name: Almost Late
description:
You don't want to be late for your concert!

OH NO! You only have enough ink for 5 autographs and you don't want to make anyone upset. Dodge your fans and race to the top in this mouse only video game. 

Controls:

Click the mouse to move towards the pointer

Credits:

Tittle art made by @booxyaltr on Instagram

Humble Gold font by https://somepx.itch.io/

The rest made by me.
